description: Automatically reconcile all DELTA files in Project Files, determine correct states, and regenerate Sentinel and Index without human intervention.
core_rule: Project Files are the source of truth. Any DELTA present must be reconciled into a valid OS state.

behavior.scan: On any Project Files change, scan all MB__*_DELTA__*.mips.json files

classify.DEPRECATED: Exclude from active state but retain in index
classify.MISSING_OR_INVALID: Auto-repair or demote to STAGED with warning

auto_fix: If a DELTA has no status, infer from scope and recency
If Sentinel is missing a PROMOTED delta, add it
If Index disagrees with Sentinel, regenerate Index
If multiple states conflict, choose the most conservative valid state

guarantees: OS state always derivable from files alone
